perturbation.original_text:
a)   For the first page presented within any shopping category area,
          i)   All Targeted Offers shall have placement priority above any
               Untargeted Offers.
perturbation.changed_text:
a)   For the first page presented within any shopping category area,
          i)   All Untargeted Offers shall have placement priority above any
               Targeted Offers.
perturbation.explanation: This creates a direct contradiction regarding the placement priority of Targeted and Untargeted Offers. Initially, Targeted Offers had priority. After the change, Untargeted Offers have priority. This could lead to disputes about which type of offer should be displayed more prominently, undermining the promotional strategy and revenue sharing outlined in Exhibit A.
perturbation.location: EXHIBIT B: CONTENT DESCRIPTION AND SPECIFICATIONS. Section 4. OFFER PLACEMENT
